heading: What is the event about?
description: The open anime campus quiz (OCAQ) is an event aimed to put your anime knowledge to test. It has been made to be comfortable for new watchers and enjoyable to the hardcore fans.

heading: Who can participate?
description: The quiz is open to all students of the university, across all departments and years. Yes, it includes everyone in UG, PG and Research Scholars.

heading: How do I register?
description: You can register for the event through the Quiz Portal. The registration portal will be open till the quiz starts.

heading: What are the prizes?
description: Apart from having fun challenging your anime trivia, the prizes include some really great posters from various anime which you may use to decorate your room.

heading: What should I bring to the event?
description: Participants are to bring a laptop or phone as the quiz will be conducted via our website. Make sure to put the device to charge before quiz. The quiz will be approximately 3 hours long so water bottle is also recommended.
